title: A SHORT FILM ABOUT LOVING
synopsis: Due to COVID-19, students from a utopian high school are forced to return home. Heartbroken from a recent break up, Tom wanders around and confronts lovers who were also experiencing separation.
screenings: OKIA Outdoor Cinema (Hanoi, Vietnam), Fulbright University Vietnam (HCMC, Vietnam), Mahindra United World College (Pune, India), Olympia Cinema (Cannes, France)

pressGallery.title: A SHORT FILM ABOUT LOVING - PRESS GALLERY
captions: Post from Fulbright University Vietnam's Art Lab.
With Cuong Le and Thanh Nguyen, Director and D.O.P. of 'The Glorious Pain' (2020), and Thao Luu, Project Coordinator of OKIA Hanoi Film Production & Creative Hub.
Q&A with Nguyen Hoang Diep, Director of 'Đập Cánh Giữa Không Trung' (2014) and Founder of OKIA Hanoi Film Production & Creative Hub.
